name: Sky-land Sim
description:
You just make your sky-land bigger and bigger.

I recommend the windows build if you want it to run smooth, and also bc the thermometer does not seem to show up in WebGL.

Originally I wanted this to be a game about supporting a sky island ecosystem with herbivores and predators, but I did not have enough time to get to the animals. However, I think this is a good grass growing simulator at least. My main take away from this experience is that parenting objects to a moving piece of land and having functions work around it can be kinda tricky.
